Extract all unique scientific names within the data frame.

```{r}
library(readr)

data <- read_csv("//Users/carriethefox/2023-GroupD/data/raw/Chicago_collision_data.csv")
data$full_name <- paste(data$Genus, data$Species)
unique_name <- unique(data$full_name)
unique_name
```
Create a new `.csv` file containing these scientific names.

```{r}
write.csv(unique_name, "unique_name.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```

Extract Genus name only.
```{r}
library(readr)

data <- read_csv("//Users/carriethefox/2023-GroupD/data/raw/Chicago_collision_data.csv")
unique_genus <- unique(data$Genus)
unique_genus
```
